column1: Bavette's Bar & Boeuf////Moving on to the entree
column2: supposedly the highlight of the night
column3: but my most disappointed part as well. I order petite fillet mignon
column4: cooked to be medium rare. And my boyfriend asks for ribeye cooked to be medium well. The first thing I notice is that the plate is NOT HOT... at most Luke-warm
column5: which is defiant something I expect to see at a restaurant of this price range. And then the steak... I don't even know where to begin. Even under the dim light
column6: I can tell that my steak is over-cooked
column7: resulting in a nearly rubbery taste. And the steak is really blaaaaaaaaaaand. Yes
column9: but I thought they would add salt when cooking the steak.
